## Project Description
Create a web page using R Markdown that features a map created with Leaflet. 

Host your webpage on either GitHub Pages, RPubs or NeoCities.

Your webpage must contain the date that your created the document and it must contain a map created with leaflet. We would love to see you show off your creativity!

### Map
Using mapping data from [Open Street Map](http://www.openstreetmap.org/).

### Date Created: December 6, 2016

## My Submission: Good Places to Eat
```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(leaflet)
RestaurantIcon <- makeIcon(
  iconUrl = "http://images.clipartpanda.com/restaurant-clip-art-restaurant-inv.jpg",
  iconWidth = 40, iconHeight = 40,
  iconAnchorX = 31*215/230/2, iconAnchorY = 16
)

RestaurantLatLong <- data.frame(
  lat = c(41.047203, 41.063750, 41.098136, 41.089375, 41.095298, 41.044102),
  lng = c(-73.943852, -73.951637, -73.952703, -74.013656, -74.015660, -73.953619))

RestaurantSites <- c(
  "<a href='http://www.il-fresco.com/'>Favorite Restaurant: Il Fresco Restaurant</a>",
  "<a href='https://www.baileysny.com/'>Great Pulled Pork: Baileys Smoke House</a>",
  "<a href='http://www.yardhouse.com/West-Nyack-NewYork'>Best Turkey Burger: Yard House</a>",
  "<a href='http://nanuetrestaurant.com/'>Best Pizza: Nanuet Restaurant</a>",
  "<a href='http://zinburger.com/'>Best Burger: ZinBurger</a>",
  "<a href='http://hikarusushi.com/'>Delicious Sushi: Hikaru Sushi</a>"
)

RestaurantLatLong %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(icon = RestaurantIcon, popup = RestaurantSites, clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())

```
